subject: NutriSystem Diet + Weightloss Promo - Eat Free for 1 Week
body:
EAT FREE FOR A WEEK!




 
 
 


 
 
 



 > 
 > Order from us today and you'll get a FULL WEEK of NutriSystem foods
 ABSOLUTELY FREE! You'll get 7 breakfasts, 7
 lunches, 7 dinners and 7 desserts—all FREE* (a $79.99
 value!).
 > 
 > ORDER
 NOW and you'll get: 
More than 120 great tasting, low-glycemic, "good carb" meals and
 desserts like pasta, pizza—even chocolate—to choose from
Plus, you'll be able to build your own customized program and
 select the food you love!
In case you haven't heard yet, brand NEW & IMPROVED
 FOODS are starting to arrive!
Perfectly portioned meals that prepare in just minutes
Delivered right to your door!
Free membership and counseling, and no center visits
Breakfast, lunch, dinner and dessert—all for about $10 a day





 


 











Offer
 good on first 28-day order only. Cannot be combined with any other current or
 prior offers or discounts. Limit one per customer. ©2006 NutriSystem,
 Inc.

 * Results not typical. All other weight loss claims are based on an independent
 survey of NutriSystem clients who stayed on the program for an average of 12
 weeks. On NutriSystem, you add-in fresh fruit, vegetables, salads and dairy
 items.
